scripts.httphelloworld: curl --request GET -i --url http://localhost:8080/ --header 'content-type: application/json' --header 'x-request-id: exampleXRequestId' --header 'x-b3-traceid: exampleXB3TraceId' --header 'x-b3-spanid: exampleXB3SpanId' --header 'x-b3-parentspanid: exampleXB3ParentId' --data '{}'
